title: 装了mod以后就报错·······
author: ssklzi123
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
A full error report has been saved to G:\minecraft\~~~~~~MineCraft-1.4.7-纯净版~~~~~~~\Minecraft147\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-02-15_20.53.26-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: 天空の遗迹
replies.txt_content: GalacticraftCore [Galacticraft Core] (Galacticraft-Alpha-0.0.2（MCBBS-sjjklh翻译介绍并搬运）.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Errored这个mod没有加载成功，马上要出门，解决方案没时间想了，请先自己检查一下mod的安装方法，一会没人回答的话我回来再看看。

replies.author: 2B国国主
replies.txt_content:
这个mod加载失败
几种可能性如下
1.与mod的API不兼容
2.与其他mod冲突
3.mod本身出错

另外如果是整合包→.→

可以尝试用原版客户端打上mod需要的API然后单独把mod装进去看能否正常加载
不能加载则是mod本身有问题 能加载就是mod之间冲突

你确定你没有把modloader的末地装在forge上？~~

replies.author: ssklzi123
replies.txt_content:
2B国国主 发表于 2013-2-15 21:31 
这个mod加载失败
几种可能性如下
1.与mod的API不兼容
我十分确定·········而且我重新是了一下····貌似是帖内的GLACTICCRAFT mod撞上去才崩溃了······
